info.name: ips-demo-invitee
info.description: This collection includes a sample set of API invocations to the IBM PAIRS Services.  The IBMid "ip.app@outlook.com" and the API key credentials used were created for demo purposes.  The IBMid is an invited subscriber of the subscription that owns the API key.  The subscription is entitled to use the datasets defined by the corpus "demo".

header.description: The mime type of this content
The mime type of this content

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
header.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Access-Control-Expose-Headers
header.description: Lets a server whitelist headers that browsers are allowed to access.

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: X-Backside-Transport
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Global-Transaction-ID
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Ibm-Id
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.name: X-RateLimit-Limit
header.description: Custom header

header.name: X-RateLimit-Remaining

response.body: { "dataset": {"id":13,"key":"cimis-raster","name":"California weather condition measurements","level":15,"layers":[{"id":134,"name":"Daily clearness factor","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":null,"formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":133,"name":"Daily clear sky solar radiation","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"W m-2","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":136,"name":"Daily maximum temperature","crs":"","shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"K","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":137,"name":"Daily mean dew point temperature","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"K","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":135,"name":"Daily minimum temperature","crs":"","shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"K","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":132,"name":"Daily net long-wave radiation","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"W m-2","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":130,"name":"Daily reference evapotranspiration","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"mm day-1","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":131,"name":"Daily solar radiation","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"W m-2","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"},{"id":138,"name":"Daily wind speed","crs":null,"shortKey":null,"interval":86400,"unitsbl":"m s-1","formula":null,"status":"ACTIVE","avroType":"fl"}],"crs":null,"ftpServer":null,"ftpUser":null,"tempCoverStart":1262322000000,"tempCoverEnd":null,"areaCover":"California"} }
